Reference

All functions

atc_copy_content() atc_open_content() atc_copy_all_content()

Copies the Access To Care examples

atc_package_content()

A list of the Access To Care examples

atc_plot_hospitals()

Plot of all counties hospital and population

atc_plot_state_map()

Plot of county level data

atc_plot_us_map()

Hex plot of the USA

atc_write_all_manifests()

Batch creation of manifests

atc_write_manifest()

Prepares manifest file

cms_raw_data

Medicare list of hospitals

folder_content_metadata()

A list of examples in a folder

format_number() format_currency()

Returns a abbreviated version of a large number

palette_atc

A list of color defaults

us_atc_county_polygons

Coordinates to draw counties

us_atc_model

Linear regression model that compares hospitals and population in a given US county

us_atc_state_polygons

Coordinates to draw state's hexagons

us_counties

List of US Counties

us_hex_polygons

Position of the 6 corners for each state's hexagon

us_hex_positions

Coordinates to center each state's hexagon

us_hospitals

List of hospitals in the USA

us_large_cities

List of large cities

us_states

List of states in the USA
